page.title: 07SATURDAY IN KEELBY
page.content: I GET UP AT 9.0 AM AND HAVE BREAKFAST AND THEN WATCH MY FAVOURITE T.V PROGRAMME.AT 10.0 AM I GET CHANGED INTO MY TRACKSUIT AND TRAINERS AND GO TO PLAY FOOTBALL AT THE PLAYING FIELD.AFTER AN HOUR OR SO MY FRIENDS AND I WANDER AROUND THE VILLAGE, OR PLAY HIDE-AND-SEEK.AT NOON I GO HOME FOR DINNER OR HAVE A TREAT BY GETTING 30p TO BUY CHIPS FROM THE CHIP SHOP.WHEN I GET THERE IT IS ALWAYS PACKED WITH PEOPLE IN A LONG QUEUE. AFTER DINNER I GET CHANGED TO GO AND WATCH A FOOTBALL MATCH IN THE TOWN OF GRIMSBY.I GET HOME AT ABOUT 1700 AND HAVE MY TEA.THEN I GO INTO THE LIVING ROOM TO WATCH TELEVISION OR PLAY ON MY SPECTRUM COMPUTER.AT ABOUT 2000 I WASH AND CHANGE INTO MY PYJAMAS AND WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL I GO TO BED AT 2200.
